creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Don Simon
description: several irregular lines of cursive characters; two larger, bold characters at R
markings: top L, when rolled, Japanese inscription; URC; rectangular intaglio,  關東第一風顛生{Kantō daiichi fūtensai} (the biggest fool in Kantō); LLC, square relief: 鵬斎 {Bōsai}; LLC, square intaglio:麴部尚書{Kikubu shōsho}
signed: LLC: 鵬斎老人書 {Bōsai rōjin sho}
title: Long Life
